titleStmt.title: The marchant A sermon preached at Paules Crosse on Sunday the 24. of August, being the day before Bartholomew faire. 1607. By Daniell Price Master of Arts, of Exeter Colledge in Oxford.
titleStmt.author: Price, Daniel, 1581-1631.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
